name: Starlite Frontier
description:
This was created for the End of Year DOS Game Jam 2022. The goal is to create a sort of space pirate syndicate simulator.  Explore star systems, find agents, raid ships, evade the imperial forces! Yo ho!

This is very much a work in progress and I make no promises about the completeness of any build. Source code will also be downloadable. Let's see how much I can make before the end of the Jam. Builds will be posted as they become stable.
